import React from "react"; import './Profile.css' function Profile({user}) { const calcNutrient = (user, index) => { let total = 0; user.foods.map((value, key) => { total += value.foodNutrients[index].value return total }) return total } const calcCalories = (user) => { let totalP = 0; let totalC = 0; let totalF = 0; user.foods.map((value, key) => { totalP += value.foodNutrients[0].value totalF += value.foodNutrients[1].value totalC += value.foodNutrients[2].value return null }) return (4*totalP + 9*totalF + 4*totalC) } if (user == null) { return (

Log in to access this feature

) } else { return (

Calories: {calcCalories(user)} kcal

  • Protein: {calcNutrient(user, 0)}g
  • Fat: {calcNutrient(user, 1)}g
  • Carbohydrates: {calcNutrient(user, 2)}g
  • A: {calcNutrient(user, 20)}mcg
  • C: {calcNutrient(user, 28)}mg
  • D: {calcNutrient(user, 24)}ug
  • E: {calcNutrient(user, 23)}mg
  • K: {calcNutrient(user, 36)}mcg
  • Thiamine: {calcNutrient(user, 29)}mg
  • Riboflavin: {calcNutrient(user, 30)}mg
  • Niacin: {calcNutrient(user, 31)}mg
  • B-6: {calcNutrient(user, 32)}mg
  • B-12: {calcNutrient(user, 34)}mcg
  • Folate: {calcNutrient(user, 33)}mcg
  • Calcium: {calcNutrient(user, 10)}mg
  • Sodium: {calcNutrient(user, 15)}mg
  • Potassium: {calcNutrient(user, 14)}mg
  • Magnesium: {calcNutrient(user, 12)}mg
  • Phosphorous: {calcNutrient(user, 13)}mg
  • Iron: {calcNutrient(user, 11)}mg
  • Zinc: {calcNutrient(user, 16)}mg
  • Copper: {calcNutrient(user, 17)}mg
  • Selenium: {calcNutrient(user, 18)}mcg

Calories: {calcCalories(user)} kcal

  • Protein: {calcNutrient(user, 0)}g
  • Fat: {calcNutrient(user, 1)}g
  • Carbohydrates: {calcNutrient(user, 2)}g
  • A: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mcg
  • C: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mg
  • D: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}ug
  • E: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mg
  • K: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mcg
  • Thiamine: {user.gender === "Male" ? 1.2 : 1.1}mg
  • Riboflavin: {user.gender === "Male" ? 1.3 : 1.1}mg
  • Niacin: {user.gender === "Male" ? 1.3 : 1.3}mg
  • B-6: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mg
  • B-12: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mcg
  • Folate: {user.gender === "Male" ? 900 : 700}mcg
  • Calcium: {calcNutrient(user, 10)}mg
  • Sodium: {calcNutrient(user, 15)}mg
  • Potassium: {calcNutrient(user, 14)}mg
  • Magnesium: {calcNutrient(user, 12)}mg
  • Phosphorous: {calcNutrient(user, 13)}mg
  • Iron: {calcNutrient(user, 11)}mg
  • Zinc: {calcNutrient(user, 16)}mg
  • Copper: {calcNutrient(user, 17)}mg
  • Selenium: {calcNutrient(user, 18)}mcg
) } } export default Profile
